entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
